TopicTitle: How did you come up with your username?

Articles.Content:
A few years back I was trying to think of a new Xbox Live gamertag. My best friend who had just signed up for Live set his gamertag to thegrandassasin so I knew I needed something with assasin in it. Eventually I came up with the name AC3XASSASIN. I was so proud of my idea I've used the name aceassasin for any kind of profile on the internet ever since.

How did you come up with yours.

i like nukes!

this has been my screen name for almost 20 years. oddly enough, its always available when i sign up for stuff.
I have no idea. I can barely remember my password, i'll probably never remember how i got my Username.
Frank Sinatra's "Fly Me to the Mun"
My username is actually my IRL nickname, which is a combination of my actual name plus my favorite color.

Pen and Paper - I played Dungeons&Dragons a couple of years ago with some friends. We played a Eberron Campain and I had a drow character. In this setting, drow have names like that. Used to be Xel'Drak, but not all Games/Forum support this. So I went with Xeldrak. Nice thing about it: It's ALLWAYS available.
Mine is Related to My cat
Because of my love for sience.
My real name is Tyler. My dad calls me goo. I was born on the 7th of October. Ty+goo+7= tygoo7
mine is the abbreviations of my name the M is the first initial the GUARN is the last five letters of my last name.
In Trouble in Terrorist Town, I became a Vending Machine. Then made a name out of it.
I......I really don't know.....

SpartanII(loved halo)-99(birth year).People started shortening the name until in a minecraft game someone said Spartwo I really liked it and all my profiles after that got the name,I even changed a few from before hand that's why my Imgur says SpartanII99.Cool thing is it's always available(Apart from twitter*grumble*)

It's my name.

That's all. Lame.
I don't know.

SuperWeegee4000 is a name I've had for a long time. It used to be that I was into an Internet meme known as Weegee. I derived it from that.

I have another name online, imadoofus. I got it from a Calvin and Hobbes strip. If you don't know what Calvin and Hobbes is, you have missed out on the best culture newspapers have to offer.

It's two letters, apart from the number. You might be able to guess where I get them from, I wasn't being very imaginitive the day I begain using this for forums.

Edited November 3, 2013 by Tw1

My name irl is Josh. One day, my best friend out of the blue walked up to me and said, "What's up, Joshington?" No reason whatsoever. He said it's a combination of "Josh and George Washington." He kept using it, I liked it, and it stuck.
Mine is my title and initials.
Xbox live gave me this username by default. That account no longer exists, but its memory lives on!
My initials, and also my first name in a almost phonetically way.

ROCKET+TURTLES=ROCKETTURTLE!

Now is that rocket science!?!?

Oh, wait... right...
It's my name. Nickname actually, but it's what everyone calls me.

Mine comes from a dragon in a DLC in Skyrim.

Edited November 7, 2013 by Krosulhah
I've used this username for +5 years on many different things. I originally got my username from my Sister, and I really liked it so I kept it.
